mapper.select: SELECT * FROM outGraDesignInfo WHERE StudentTitleresultID=( SELECT StudentTitleresultID FROM studentTitleResult WHERE studentID=#{studentID})

SELECT i.outsideApplyID AS table1ID,i.tableName AS table1Name,i.status AS table1Status,i.isCommit AS table1Commit, t.outGraDesignApplyID AS table2ID,t.tableName AS table2Name,t.checkStatus AS table2Status,t.isOk AS table2Commit, l.leaveID table3ID,l.tableName AS table3Name,l.checkStatus AS table3Status,l.isOk AS table3Commit, att.attachmentID as table6ID,att.attachmentName as table6Name,att.iscommit AS table6Commit, agg.agreementID as table4ID,agg.agreementName as table4Name,agg.applyStatus AS table4Status,agg.remark AS table4Commit, s.sureID as table5ID,s.sureName as table5Name,s.iscommit AS table5Commit FROM outGraDesignInfo i,outGraDesignTitleApply t,graDesignLeaveApply l,outsideGraDesignAttachment att, outsideGraDesignAgreemen agg,outGraDesignSureBook s WHERE i.outsideApplyID=t.outsideApplyID AND i.outsideApplyID=l.outsideApplyID AND i.outsideApplyID=att.outsideApplyID AND i.outsideApplyID=agg.outsideApplyID AND i.outsideApplyID=s.outsideApplyID AND i.outsideApplyID=#{id};
